statements: DELETE FROM AgriculturalAreas WHERE location = 'North Field';
DELETE FROM PesticideUsage WHERE id = 100 AND application_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM AgriculturalAreas WHERE total_acres < 5000 OR soil_type = 'Clay'
DELETE FROM Pesticide_Usage WHERE pesticide_name = 'Herbicide' AND area_covered > 100;
DELETE FROM application_records WHERE application_area > 100 AND application_method = 'Aerial Spray'
DELETE FROM environmental_impact WHERE impact_type = 'Water Pollution';
